title: The influence of an agricultural intervention on social capital and water insecurity coping strategies: Qualitative evidence from female smallholder farmers living with HIV in western Kenya
content:
Publication date: 15 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Patrick M. Owuor, Joshua D. Miller, Samanvi S. Kanugula, Joohee Yeam, Shalean Collins, Valeria Obure, Titus Arunga, Phelgona Otieno, Beatrice Olack, Lisa M. Butler, Elizabeth A. Bukusi, Craig R. Cohen, Sheri D. Weiser, Sera L. Young
